page.title: 12Mr Marney the naturalist
page.content: During the visit of Mr Marney Katherine Porter said that she lived on a farm and had an unused barn.So he thought that he could release 4 barn owls in the barn,if we could design suitable cages. Cages We made the cages out of leather,nails,wood and wire.First of all we had to measure up the wood and make the frames.We had to make them properly for they all had to fit together.We had to use square wire so that it would'nt damage the owls wings.Leather made a perfect hinge.The cages were split in to 3 parts,2 for the owls ,1 for safety. Continued from page 11, Continued to page 13.
